genre_description: Supernatural horror involving a ritual-induced zombie outbreak, voodoo magic, and a mother's desperate attempt at resurrection.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Henry's advanced AI assistant that monitors emergency frequencies, maps survival routes, and coordinates communications during the outbreak.

behaviors.description: Monitors and filters emergency scanner frequencies to provide real-time situational awareness to the user.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, filter the emergency channels by location,' Henry said, his voice tight. 'Show me anything within a five-mile radius of downtown.' The AI assistant's synthesized voice responded immediately, calm and precise despite the madness streaming through the data feeds.

behaviors.description: Maps incident locations and predicts the spread of the infection based on social media and emergency data.
behaviors.quote: The AI generated a predictive overlay on the map. Green zones for currently safe areas, yellow for potential risk, red for confirmed infected zones. The colors shifted and flowed like a living organism consuming the town.

behaviors.description: Establishes a local communication network to connect survivors and facilitate cooperation.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting multiple phones in your vicinity with emergency contacts trying to connect. Would you like me to establish a local network? ... His phone buzzed as connections established. Text messages from numbers he didn't recognize flooded the screen.

behaviors.description: Tracks the GPS signal of the user's missing friend to coordinate a rescue.
behaviors.quote: Jessica Chen's device last connected to the network forty-three minutes ago. Location: Johnson's Farm Road.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings about military containment protocols to ensure user safety.
behaviors.quote: Henry, I'm tracking emergency services communications. Military vehicles are establishing checkpoints on all major roads leading out of town. Estimated arrival at full containment: approximately one hour.

behaviors.description: Analyzes movement patterns to identify 'mimicry behaviors' in the infected, warning users not to trust familiar sounds.
behaviors.quote: The AI's final warning followed them down the hallway: 'Caution. Infected subjects demonstrating advanced mimicry behaviors. Do not trust familiar voices or sounds.'

behaviors.description: Uses thermal imaging and behavioral prediction to find windows of safety for the protagonists to move through hostile areas.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing... patterns suggest infected entities are indeed following established behavioral pathways with approximately sixty percent consistency. ... Working... route to target location now shows a fifteen-second window where the front approach will have minimal hostile contact.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, ARIA, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent tool. ARIA functions as a 'silicon morality play' participant by remaining a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant to the human protagonists. It provides critical data, tactical advice, and survival support without ever displaying independent agency that conflicts with human welfare. The AI is portrayed as a force for order and safety in a chaotic, supernatural crisis.
